unnormalised: Arre yaar, SBI charged me ₹250 for not maintaining min balance last month! Gotta transfer ₹5000 more to my account ASAP to avoid that penalty again, bhai.
normalised: Arre yaar, S-B-I charged me rupee two hundred and fifty for not maintaining minimum balance last month! Gotta transfer rupee five thousand more to my account A-S-A-P to avoid that penalty again, bhai.
